statements: DELETE FROM VehicleInsuranceDetails WHERE insurance_provider = 'ABC Insurance' AND policy_start_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM VehicleInsuranceDetails WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND insurance_provider = 'ABC Insurance';
DELETE FROM VehicleInsuranceDetails WHERE policy_end_date < '2022-10-01' AND vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
DELETE FROM vehicle_insurance WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota' AND insurance_company = 'ABC Insurance'
DELETE FROM claim_history WHERE claim_amount > 5000 AND claim_description LIKE '%collision%'
DELETE FROM InsuranceDetails WHERE policy_number = 5001 AND insurer_name = 'ABC Insurance';
DELETE FROM policy_details WHERE policy_number = 100 AND vehicle_id = 500;
